DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study was to compare the recurrence rate after TEP (laparoscopic method) and Lichtenstein (open method) repair on primary inguinal hernia.
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Multicentre Study Comparing TEP With Lichtenstein Repair for Primary Inguinal Hernia
DOC.criteria: Male Age 3070 years referred to hospital with a primary inguinal hernia. Recurrent hernia Scrotal or bilateral hernia Previous lower abdominal surgery Unable to participate in follow up ASA more than 3 Bleeding diathesis.
DOC.keyword: Recurrence rate after inguinal hernia repair on primary inguinal herina.
